name: Visual FoxPro Menu
summary: An MNX file is a custom menu file created by Microsoft Visual FoxPro, a database management system. It contains information that defines the layout and functionality of a custom menu system, specifying items, commands, and submenus that users interact with in a FoxPro application. MNX files allow developers to configure customized menus based on the application's requirements.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
